summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to certain vending protected by the United States Constitution and the Washington Constitution on property under the jurisdiction of the Engineering, Seattle Center and Parks and Recreation Departments; setting fees for said vending on said property by amending the schedule of fees authorized by Seattle Municipal Code Section 15.04.070, adding a new section to Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 17.16, and amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 18.28.010 and Exhibit A thereto; and authorizing said departments to formulate rules governing such vending.
